welcome_01: <speak><par><media xml:id="yanny1"><prosody pitch="0.65" rate="0.6">Hi! I'm Yanny!</prosody></media><media xml:id="laurel1" begin="0.8s"><prosody pitch="0.45" rate="0.4">And I'm Laurel.</prosody></media><media xml:id="yanny2" begin="laurel1.end-0.3s"><prosody pitch="0.65" rate="0.6">We'd like to introduce you to Kiai!</prosody></media><media xml:id="laurel2" begin="yanny2.end-1.2s"><prosody pitch="0.45" rate="0.4">This is Kiai Voice Action framework.</prosody></media><media xml:id="yanny3" begin="laurel2.end-0.8s"><prosody pitch="0.65" rate="0.6">Frameworkyeah!</prosody></media><media xml:id="laurel3" begin="yanny3.end-0.1s"><prosody pitch="0.45" rate="0.5" volume="0.7">Shut up.</prosody></media><media xml:id="yanny4" begin="laurel3.end-0.1s"><prosody pitch="0.65" rate="0.8" volume="0.4">Okay.</prosody></media></par></speak>
